attributes.action: To make Party Councillors job full or part time and have a proper pay salary.
attributes.additional_details:
Councillors get allowances but that’s not good enough, as I’ve said in the ‘background’ they do similar things as MP’s and it’s only fair that Councillors are paid a real wage instead of the allowances.

Councillors are part of the political parties and so they should be made equal and shown that their hard work is noticed etc.
attributes.background: Political Party Councillors do an amazing job and are similar things to what the MP’s do. So I think Councillors job need to be full time or part time and for them to have a proper pay salary as they do so much hard work and deserve a proper pay salary.
